c:complexType.name: CategoricalNumericChart
c:complexType.c:documentation:
The common options documentation class of Categorical charts with a continuous-numeric orthogonal axis.
For information on the supported data formats see .

c:property.name: visualRoles
c:property.c:documentation:
The chart's visual roles map.
See for more information.

c:property.name: color
c:property.c:documentation:
The first color axis options.
This axis can also be accessed by the property name color.
See for more information on the way that the color axes' properties may be accessed.

c:property.name: orthoAxis
c:property.c:documentation:
The orthogonal cartesian axis panel options.
When the chart is vertical the orthogonal axis is laid out vertically.
See to know the additional names by which a cartesian axis can be referred to.

c:property.name: extensionPoints
c:property.c:documentation: The extension points object contains style definitions for the marks of the chart.

c:complexType.name: CategoricalNumericChartVisualRoles
c:complexType.c:documentation: The visual roles options class of the categorical chart types with a continuous-numeric orthogonal axis.

c:complexType.name: CategoricalNumericChartExtensionPoints
c:complexType.c:documentation:
The extension points of the categorical chart types with a continuous-numeric orthogonal axis.
Chart extension points can also be specified directly at the chart options level.
To use an extension point you must find its full name, by joining:
extension property (ex: smallBase)
the "_" character
extension sub-property (ex: strokeStyle)
and obtaining, for the examples, the camel-cased name: smallBase_strokeStyle (see ).

c:complexType.name: CategoricalNumericPlot
c:complexType.c:documentation: The common options documentation class of categorical plot types with a continuous-numeric orthogonal axis.

c:property.name: stacked
c:property.c:documentation: Indicates that visual elements having identical category, but different series, are displayed on top of each other, along the plot's orthogonal direction, instead of side-by-side, along the base direction.

c:property.name: nullInterpolationMode
c:property.c:documentation:
The interpolation mode used to fill-in null or missing values.
The interpolation is applied to the measure roles of the plot that are represented in the orthogonal cartesian axis.
With the exception of the box plot, this role is the value role. All of the box plot measure roles: median, lowerQuartil, upperQuartil, minimum, and maximum, are interpolated using the specified mode.

c:property.name: orthoAxis
c:property.c:documentation:
The index of the orthogonal cartesian axis to use for the plot.
The possible values are 1, 2 and 3.
The main plot of a chart always uses the axis 1.
